message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this valuable product with you. I think it's a great opportunity for both of us to come to a mutually beneficial agreement. I'm willing to start with a price of $1200000, which is a very competitive offer considering the product's value to you.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. However, $1200000 is still a bit steep for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $1100000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand that you're trying to get a good deal, but I'm not willing to go as low as $1100000. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my original offer, so I'm counteroffering $1150000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice. However, I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to compromise further and offer $1120000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Bob. However, I'm not willing to go as low as $1120000. I'm willing to make another concession, but I need to get closer to my minimum price. I'm counteroffering $1180000. This is the lowest I'm willing to go, and I believe it's still a fair price considering the product's value to you.

I understand that you're trying to get closer to your minimum price, Alice, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to make another compromise and offer $1140000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Bob. However, I'm not willing to go as low as $1140000. I'm going to try to get a bit closer to my minimum price, but I still need to be mindful of the value the product holds for you. I'm counteroffering $1190000. This is my final concession, and I believe it's the best price we can both agree on.

I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, Alice, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to make one more compromise and offer $1160000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.

I appreciate your willingness to make one more compromise, Bob. However, I'm not willing to go as low as $1160000. I've already made significant concessions, and I need to prioritize my minimum price. I'm counteroffering $1200000, which is the lowest I'm willing to go. If you're not willing to meet me at this price, I'm afraid I'll have to consider other options.
